title: Strengthening Patient Care Competencies: Design Thinking-Based Information Technology Project Design

context.prior_knowledge: Experience in utilizing basic information technology (programming/digital tools)
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can systematically resolve information technology problems by applying the five-stage Design Thinking process.
Learners can produce diverse digital content (app prototypes/interactive media) using smartphone-based tools.
Learners can plan creative IT solutions in collaborative environments and propose improvements incorporating user feedback.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
